name: Taylor’s 9th Teaching and Learning Conference
content: The theme this year, “Redesigning Learning for Greater Social Impact”, has been carefully selected in recognition of the strong link between educational practice and the social nature of learning. Whether it is the design of pedagogical intervention and learning culture, the inclusion of socio-emotional support in teaching and policy, transforming technology to support the social fabric of our institutions, or challenging established beliefs about learning, this conference will explore each one, with the support of our expert speakers and presenters. Are you ready to find out what else can be done in RE-designing the social future of learning? Join us, as we collectively expand our vision of Redesigning Learning for Greater Social Impact by submitting your paper, or joining us as a participant.
